DOC.detailed_description: Infrarenal abdominal aortic aneurysm may treat introduction abdominal aortic stent graft via femoral route . This technique commonly use high surgical risk patient also suitable certain condition normal risk patient . Abdominal aortic stent graft , insert via femoral artery , use treat infrarenal abdominal aortic aneurysm , remove need invasive surgical procedure . The aim observational study evaluate long-term ( 5 year ) benefit technique document overall mortality , complication ( endoleak , migration ) , rate surgical conversion , progression rupture aneurysm cohort patient representative treated population real condition use .
